DOC.brief_summary: This study compare 2 currently market formula healthy full term baby : Nutramigen A+ ( hypoallergenic formula ) Nutramigen-Enflora ( hypoallergenic formula Lactobacillus GG ( LGG ) ) 3 month formula feed . The investigator ' aim compare 3 outcomes baby : ( 1 ) normal baby cry time ; ( 2 ) composition intestinal microbiota ( bacteria stool ) ; ( 3 ) lab test measure number white blood cell large intestine ( fecal calprotectin ) . The investigator predict LGG supplementation ( Nutramigen-Enflora ) facilitate establishment important component neonatal intestinal microbial community reduce fecal calprotectin .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lactobacillus Rhamnosus GG ( LGG ) Infant Colic
DOC.criteria: Sixty healthy fullterm colicky infant ( gestational age 32 wks 41 wks ) chronic lung disease , diarrhea ( stool take shape container > 5x daily ) fever
